text: I was pretty sure that I would never be
able to come home alive after what they
basically started doing with me and I
was like my family and friends should
not witness me being executed in the
video or whatever so I might as well you
know
do it do it myself so for me that was
that was the only thing and after that
they made sure that I couldn't do that
again even though I wanted to for a long
time
my friends it was the fact that we were
people together even though some point
we hated each other more than anything
because we were sitting in a small room
that was the thing that kept kept us
sane there was the thing that that
helped us so when the reason like I
tried to take my own life after two
weeks in captivity if I've been together
with a person that person might have
said to me don't do that any
right away I was very excited and then I
completely lost all the like excitement
inside myself oh just I felt so bad I
felt so ashamed about the feeling I just
had because you know we had this thing
that we wanted to leave it together we
had this idea that when we're going to
be released we're going to the hotel and
we're just you know eating everything
from the buffet and we are you know
having long showers and and we just
imagine how we would experience this
release together
